name: Run Billy Run
description:
In 'Run Billy Run', you meet Billy, a cute water creature that needs to swim throughout the sea until no more!

Run Billy Run, is a casual game that will be released until the end of July on Itch and gamejolt. We are a small team of two people based in Portugal, and if you want to support the development of the game and help the game to be on both the PlayStore and the AppStore, you can:

- Support us here: https://ko-fi.com/frazoni

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move.

Play Tester Version:

  • Keep in mind that this is the Play Tester version of the game and doesn't represent the final product.
  • The game doesn't have any sounds/music yet and the shop hasn't been implemented.
  • Any feedback is very much appreciated.

Benefits of supporting the game:

  • You will have access to the source file of one art asset used in the game! (you choose which);
  • Billy will be very happy.

Credits:

-Programming: Diogo Frazão (frazoni);

-Game Design: Diogo Frazão (frazoni);

-Art and Animation: Diogo Frazão (frazoni);

-Music Design and Composer: ThEndGuy.
